p: After oral administration and once dissolved, EPL is rapidly absorbed from the upper gastrointestinal tract (GIT) with a negligible food effect and reaches its maximum plasma concentration within 1.5â€“2 hours. EPL is extensively metabolized in the liver (less than 5% of a dose is excreted in urine in an unmodified form) via CYP3A4 to inactive metabolites [ 1, 13]. The hepatic first-pass metabolism of EPL is 12.6% and 27.1% under fasted and fed conditions, respectively, with a significant effect on drug bioavailability (69% for a 100 mg oral tablet). EPL is mainly excreted in urine with a t 1/2 of 3 to 6 hours [ 14].
